title: [SOLVED]820-3023-A BIOS required
message: Searching this group hasn't shown any hits for one;  hoping someone can provide a bios dump for me to test on a board here that fanspins, cpu gets warm, but no chime/dong or display.

title: [SOLVED]820-3023-A BIOS required
message:
Hello Paul, try this one, it does not have  a clean ME region, but it should at lesat chime and show video..

If it work i can help you to set a clean ME region and the correct serial number...

[url]https://www.4shared.com/rar/lFV6Qyw8fi/820-3023-A_BIOS.html?[/url]
